company.name: WebAiGen
company.description: WebAiGen is a next-generation digital agency specializing in AI-driven web development, neural interface design, and autonomous software systems.

landingPage.title: High-Conversion Landing Page
landingPage.description: Single-page conversion funnels optimized with AI-generated copy, A/B testing logic, and high-performance React architecture.

fullWebsite.title: Corporate Website Architecture
fullWebsite.description: Scalable multi-page applications (Next.js) with dynamic content management, SEO matrices, and brand-aligned motion design.

ecommerce.title: AI-Enhanced E-Commerce
ecommerce.description: Digital storefronts featuring smart product recommendations, dynamic pricing algorithms, and seamless payment gateways.

aiPlatform.title: SaaS / AI Platform
aiPlatform.description: Custom web applications integrated with LLMs (OpenAI/Anthropic), Vector Databases, and Agentic workflows.

aiIntegration.title: Neural Integration
aiIntegration.description: Retrofitting existing platforms with chatbots, predictive analytics, or voice synthesis modules.

consulting.title: Tech Stack Consulting
consulting.description: Strategic advisory on AI adoption, cloud architecture, and automation feasibility.

contact.responseTime: AI Agents reply instantly; Humans within 4 hours.

warranty.materials: SLA uptime guarantees for hosted solutions.
warranty.satisfaction: Iterative revision cycles included in every sprint.

faqs.q: What is the difference between a standard site and an AI site?
faqs.a: Standard sites display information. AI sites interact, learn from users, and automate tasks using LLMs.

faqs.q: Do you offer hosting and maintenance?
faqs.a: Yes, we provide managed Vercel/AWS hosting with 24/7 monitoring.

faqs.q: Can you train an AI on my specific business data?
faqs.a: Absolutely. We build RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems that index your PDFs, docs, and Notion files.
You own 100% of the IP upon final payment.

promotions.currentOffer: Free Vector Database setup for all AI Platform projects this month.
promotions.financing: Net-30 terms available for Enterprise contracts.
